required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of BIIB074
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Fixed-sequence, Phase 1 Study of the Effect of CYP3A4 Inhibition by Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of BIIB074 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to assess the effect of cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A4 inhibition on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of BIIB074. The secondary objectives of this study are to assess the safety and tolerability of BIIB074 when co-administered with a strong CYP3A4 inhibitor and to assess the effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the PK of 3 metabolites of BIIB074 (CNV3000497 [M13], CNV2283325 [M14], and CNV2288584 [M16]).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

primary_outcome.measure: Exposure of BIIB074 as measured by area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity (AUCinf)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal elimination half-life (t1/2) of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent total body clearance (CL/F) of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution (Vd/F) of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to time of the last measurable drug concentration (AUC0-t) of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time that the maximum observed concentration occurs (Tmax) of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants experiencing adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 25 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically significant vital sign abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 25 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically significant 12-lead electrocardiograms (ECGs) abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 25 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically significant laboratory assessment abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 25 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the Cmax of 3 metabolites of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the AUCinf of 3 metabolites of BIIB074
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the AUC0-t of CNV3000497 (M13)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the AUC0-t of CNV2283325 (M14)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the AUC0-t of CNV2288584 (M16)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the Tmax of CNV3000497 (M13)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the Tmax of CNV2283325 (M14)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the Tmax of CNV2288584 (M16)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the t1/2 of CNV3000497 (M13)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the t1/2 of CNV2283325 (M14)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of CYP3A4 inhibition on the t1/2 of CNV2288584 (M16)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing up to 96 hours post dose

arm_group.description: Administered orally on Day 1 and Day 11

intervention.description: Administered as specified in the treatment arm
200 mg twice daily [BID] on Day 8 and once daily (QD) from Day 9 to Day 15 inclusive

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index of 18 to 29 kg/m2, inclusive, with body weight ≥50 kg for males and ≥45 kg for females.
- Male or postmenopausal or surgically sterile females.
- Must be in good health as determined by the Investigator (or designee), based on medical history and screening evaluations.
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Females of childbearing potential.
- Other unspecified reasons that, in the opinion of the Investigator or Sponsor, make the subject unsuitable for enrollment.
NOTE: Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
